item.title: New Years Resolution
item.description: Self-Improvement; Every year I make New Years resolutions, and I’m somewhat successful in holding to them. This year I’ve resolved to improve myself by bettering my ability to program. I’d say I’m middling in my current ability. I rarely find myself incapable of performing a task, but I’d rarely say my solutions are the most optimized or clear to read. On another note, I also struggle to sound professional in emails and other written correspondence and I think writing a devlog would help me in that regards.
item.content:
Self-Improvement;

Every year I make New Years resolutions, and I’m somewhat successful in holding to them. This year I’ve resolved to improve myself by bettering my ability to program. I’d say I’m middling in my current ability. I rarely find myself incapable of performing a task, but I’d rarely say my solutions are the most optimized or clear to read. On another note, I also struggle to sound professional in emails and other written correspondence and I think writing a devlog would help me in that regards. I’m currently working through the 2020 Advent of Code to improve my understanding and utilization of Modern C++. I’ll be posting my solutions over the course of the next month or so and will likely work through most of 2015-2019 throughout the course of the year.

    std::cout << "Hello, World!" << std::endl;
